---
title: Getting R Help
---

To get help help for a particular function, type ? and then the function name:

```
?mean

```

General help:

* [Cookbook for R](http://www.cookbook-r.com/) - lots of plotting help here, including ggplot2
* Google (It actually knows what "R" is now)
* Stackoverflow.com (use the `[r]` tag)
* http://www.rdocumentation.org/
* Each other! (Talk it out)

ggplot2:

* [ggplot2 official documentation](http://docs.ggplot2.org/current/)
* [Color Brewer](http://colorbrewer2.org/): A great general resource for choosing colour palettes

Books:
* [The Art of R Programming]()
* [Hadley Wickham's online book: Advanced R Programming](http://adv-r.had.co.nz/)
